text:
Greetings from Bucharest, Romania! :wave:
Happy to join you.

I'm with <@UJFFNJZCL> on the "selling your specialness" <@UJF07U96Y> I've always found the hardest part to be believing it myself. The clients worth keeping will pay for your 'Special K!" Let the rest eat corn flakes. :innocent:
Hi everyone! Sending some content marketing love from Bucharest, Romania as well!
Thanks <@UJFCX0N3X> :slightly_smiling_face:
<@UJG9WTEKG> should we convert any dollar amounts into USD for this?
Hey, everyone! I'm a freelance writer for B2B SaaS companies, based in Manchester (UK). Super excited to learn from you all.
<!channel> Hi Everyone! Drea from IL! I'm a marketing company for B2B tradeshow company and copywriter!
Where at in IL? I'm in Peoria!
Hey all! I’m at a B2B SaaS company called Global App Testing - based in London. :slightly_smiling_face::wave:
Thanks <@UJFCX0N3X>. Selling myself is the hardest :slightly_smiling_face:
ideally yes, but i can convert later if you mark it as CAD, euro, etc
Well you now have an international cheerleading team ma'am. Hopefully that'll make it a little easier.
Hey all! I'm over at InVision :wave:
:wave: Hi, thanks for the invite! I'm the Director of Content at Sensu
Whoa! <@UJG4WTGKS> didn't I help write your resume back in the day?
I was just wondering where I know you from, but I think you wrote some content for us when I was at Hubstaff :slightly_smiling_face:
Hi! I’m Sara, a copywriter and editor from Barcelona, mostly working in Spanish and Catalan and familiar with English-speaking and Italian markets too :slightly_smiling_face:
Bona tarda, Sara! :slightly_smiling_face:
Bona tarda, Ilia! Encantada :blush:

Hi, thanks for the invite :raised_hands::wave: I’m Dunja, and I’m a remote Marketing and Growth consultant with a strong background in content marketing. Looking forward to sharing knowledge and connecting with everyone!
Hi all - I run www.theedge.group in NYC (content strategy firm specialized in newsletters)  - excited to meet everyone

attachments.title: Email Newsletter Consulting | The Edge Group
attachments.text: The Edge Group is a B2B Content Marketing Agency that specializes in Email Marketing, Newsletter Design and Strategy, and Agile Content Creation processes.
attachments.fallback: Email Newsletter Consulting | The Edge Group

text: ..err didn't mean to have that link unfurl :hushed:
Hey everyone! I’m from Mumbai and I write about domain names and online marketing.
<@UJGG5LD9B> just slack defaults
It's all blur. Either way, nice to reconnect :slightly_smiling_face:
Likewise!

Hey, I'm Josh from Nashville, TN! Most recently I was the lead content manager for ClickUp, a project management company but have moved on to something else that I will start soon :eyes: Can't wait to learn from all of you!
hey josh!
i was in nashville for the first time about a month ago and looooved it
what a cool city
we stayed in the five points neighborhood and i have never eaten so well
Hi! I'm Lisa. I currently work as a content creator for a startup in St. Louis, MO.

<@UJF07U96Y> another slightly more aggressive approach would be to raise your rates with your customers. This can be tricky, of course, but if you have the financial flexibility to do so and you calculate the potential churn, you could use this to increase your income by replacing old customers with new ones at the higher rate.
hey Adam!
Normal!
What’s up everyone! Greetings from Key West, Florida :sunglasses:. I’m a freelancer and website owner.
Hey Devin! :wave:
Hey, I'm Avi from Toronto! I'm an in-house content marketer for a hardware tech startup...
Hey everyone! I'm Emily, from the UK, currently running content marketing for Akkroo but we've recently been acquired by Integrate so soon... who knows.
<@UJAFNEVH7> Hey, didn't you launch the State of SaaS study a few days ago?
Yep, that was me :slightly_smiling_face:
Hi from Canada! :wave: :flag-ca:  I'm a marketer at Unbounce, a B2B SaaS company - looking forward to chatting with all of you here!
Hello! Has anyone here done a blog redesign -- large or small -- recently? I'd love to chat.
We're about to launch a redesign here at ActiveCampaign – feel free to DM me
yoooooo Emily :grin:
Hey! It's been a long time since we slacked!
Hi from Paris  :fr:
we are in the process of it right now
one of the rules of the internet is everyone is always about to redesign
Hello! I'm Matt Stolpe, I'm a content creator in St. Louis. I work with <@UJ56D4ZTL>.
We’re neighbours! I think…
Thanks I'll follow up with y'all!!
Hannah, thought your name looked familiar then I figured out it was Tech Ladies! Just went through a redesign - happy to DM any time!
Really!? Which company are you at <@UJ420S7MG>?
Bananatag! (We’re very small, prolly never heard of us.)
I have! Can't remember how (maybe an email?), but I definitely have. :smile:
What's good people. Dennis here, digital marketing manager at Core dna, a content and commerce SaaS platform. Looking forward to chat and connect with y'all
Yeah, nice! I don't live too far from there.

Hey everyone, glad to be here and greetings from Calcutta, India! I'm a consultant helping SaaS companies with brand positioning and improving brand perception and content is at the centre of everything I do! <http://Integromat.com|Integromat.com> is my main client but I also work with other companies focused on automation. Happy to chat about any of the above! :raised_hands:
